title: Bad for Me : The Prequel: A New Adult Novel
description: “I would do anything for my brother and my mother.” At thirteen, kids should be in school and learning, but when everything has to start from scratch, sometimes, one has to take risk to live. That’s what the young Drake Henderson did. After seeing her mother carry the burden since their father had left them, he took it into his own hands to help his family earn a living. But what happens if it turns out that his source of income comes from the city’s most wanted gang? It is the story of the ultimate sacrifice for the family. Grab your copy now!
author: Cheryl F.M.
